titles: An Abridgment of the late remonstrance of the army vvith some marginall attestations for the better understanding remembrance and judgement of the people : collected by speciall order for more publique satisfaction, and to undeceive the kingdome as to the false glosses by some put upon the said remonstrance printed.
author: Rushworth, John, 1612?-1690.
notes: "By the appointment of the Lord Generall, and his Generall Councell of Officers. Decem. 27, 1648. Signed, Jo. Rushworth"
